text: Mayanglambam is a Meetei family. It is native to Ancient Kangleipak (Antique Manipur). People of this family mainly live in Manipur, India. == History == During the era of King Samuroiba Ningthou, the temple dedicated to God Khamlangba was built in Kakching Khullen. The temple was maintained by the Mayanglambam family. == Notable persons == * Mangka Mayanglambam - Indian folk artist == References == Category:Meitei surnames
title: Mayanglambam
